description.fr: {#critical}\_: Inflige {magicalDamage:Spell.755.dmgd2} aux adversaires autour\_<sprite name="cell_around"/> de la cible.
description.en: {#critical}: Does {magicalDamage:Spell.755.dmgd2} to opponents around\_<sprite name="cell_around"/> the target.
description.es: {#critical}: Inflige {magicalDamage:Spell.755.dmgd2} a los adversarios de alrededor\_<sprite name="cell_around"/> del objetivo.
description.de: {#critical}: Verursacht bei Gegnern ringsum\_<sprite name="cell_around"/> des Ziels {magicalDamage:Spell.755.dmgd2}.
description.pt: {#critical}: Inflige {magicalDamage:Spell.755.dmgd2} aos adversários em\_volta\_<sprite name="cell_around"/> do alvo.
